originalText.text: Dr. Allison Godlewicz is an excellent audioligist  who goes the extra mile to make sure her patients are fitted with and understand all the pros and cons of the appriate hearing devices. Dr Godlewicz is very kind and caring. I have referred many people to her and they are all happy with her expertise and help.

text.text: Dr. Allison Godlewicz is an excellent audioligist  who goes the extra mile to make sure her patients are fitted with and understand all the pros and cons of the appriate hearing devices. Dr Godlewicz is very kind and caring. I have referred many people to her and they are all happy with her expertise and help.

originalText.text: Dr. Allison Godlewicz and her colleague, Eric E. Smouha, M.D., are highly competent health care providers. With a keen sense of understanding of those who are in need of hearing care, Drs. Godlewicz and Smouha skillfully and without rush gain precious doctor and patient relationships. Such satisfaction is priceless and is very important to me. Moreover, the excellent communicative skills - listening and verbal - Drs. Godlewicz and Smouha possess, together with their courteous manner, relaxed me. Because Drs. Godlewicz and Smouha spoke clearly yet simply always I could grasp details about my hearing problem. The straightforward set of suggestions and recommendations by Drs. Godlewicz and Smouha spurred optimism to resolve my hearing problem. The hearing related health care provided continually by Drs. Godlewicz and Smouha, together with their associates Omar, Cara, Rena and Jocelyn, surpasses my expectations. Thank you ENT and Allergy Associates, LLP so very much.
